approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender.

balanceOf.description: Returns the token balance of a specific address.

cap.description: Returns the cap on the total supply of tokens.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used in the token.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to withdraw from the caller’s account.

getRoleAdmin.description: Returns the admin role that controls a specific role.

grantRole.description: Grants a specific role to an account.

hasRole.description: Checks if an account has a specific role.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to withdraw from the caller’s account.

mint.description: Mints new tokens and assigns them to an address.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

renounceRole.description: Renounces a specific role from the caller.

revokeRole.description: Revokes a specific role from an account.

supportsInterface.description: Checks if the contract implements a specific interface.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

Approval.description: Emitted when an approval is made for a spender to withdraw tokens.

RoleAdminChanged.description: Emitted when a role’s admin role is changed.

RoleGranted.description: Emitted when a role is granted to an account.

RoleRevoked.description: Emitted when a role is revoked from an account.

Transfer.description: Emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another.
